entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Rankin Inlet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:19 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -40.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rankin Inlet Airport 07:07 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -40.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -60
Dewpoint: -44.9°C
Wind: NNW 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 41.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 41. Wind chill minus 62 this morning and minus 57 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 47.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 47. Wind chill minus 58 this evening and minus 65 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023
